summary: 14-year-old Madeinusa comes of age during the Easter festivities of her tiny, isolated village.
cast: Magaly Solier|Carlos J. de la Torre|Yiliana Chong|Juan Ubaldo Huamán|Melvin Quijada|Vicento Llauca Trejo|Kike Ortiz|Hermelinda Luján|Enriqueta Valdiviano|Eliazar Aquino|Luis Gonzales|Antonio Morales|Daniel Ocano Paucar|Teresa Villanueve
title: Madeinusa
